name: Hypovital
description:
Explore the maze like building to search for your missing comrade. You will encounter surreal threats and vision is your weakness.

Use gadgets such as Night Vision goggles and gun to ease your mission.

Hypovital presents to you similar control scheme similar to survival horror classics like Resident Evil and etc.

Join the adventure to find your friend and discover the truth behind everything.

Only works for Windows 7 and above.

We appreciate every purchase and this will help us to get the money to get into Greenlight.

Thank you.
